content: Flake lives up to his name. He is a worthless congressman and idiot republicans were positive all the hateful things Comrade Trump wanted to do was ONLY going to affect liberals and brown people. NOW we have morons like Flake who are completely unable to think for themselves. They just go there knowing who to kissass to so if they survive 3 elections or more they can start taking bribes then when they are the losers in an election they can simply cash in their chips with the companies they took bribes from as a paid lobbyist or consultant. They don’t give a damn about you voters.
